title: 1990s Russia Communist party and Yabloko platforms

content.question: Differences in the platforms of two parties important in the first decade of postcommunist Russia—the Communist Party and Yabloko— have reflected disagreements on primarily what policy?

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
